content: this cozy crochet blanket works up in a flash perfect for beginners this simple throw uses a combination of single_crochet and chain stitches to create the ever-popular and cushiony soft moss stitch pattern this voluminous throw looks great in any shade and is an irresistible addition to the family room bedroom guest room and more yarn for model bernat® blanket extra thick™ 21 2 oz/600 g 72 yds/66 m deep navy 62011 5 balls or bernat® blanket big watercolor™ 21 2 oz/600 g 72 yds/66 m arctic 06008 6 balls
